Description: After enabling HDR, the laptop's brightness decreases in scenes with a lot of dark colors, making subtitles and other text difficult to see. Even the white text that appears when restarting becomes dimmer. However, this does not happen in scenes with light colors. What can I do about this?
Title: Windows system HDR brightness auto-adjustment issue
